name: Drivetime
description:
Drivetime is the world’s first and only app that lets you play trivia while you drive!

Are you one of the 110 million North Americans who drives to and from work by yourself? Do you wish you could play games, safely, while you drive your car? Well wish no longer - Drivetime is here to beat the boredom of the daily commute!

You can challenge friends, family and coworkers to a game of trivia, with fresh games every day of the working week, Monday through Friday. Thanks to recent advances in speech recognition technology, we are finally able to offer you gaming using just your voice - designed specifically with the commuter driver in mind. Keep your hands on the wheel where they belong, focus your eyes on the road where they should be, but open your mind (and your mouth) to the fun and entertaining challenge of daily trivia - all while driving your car! How 21st century is that?

Drivetime is perfect for trivia novices and experts alike - our escalating difficulty scales just like your trivia knowledge! We’ve optimized everything to fit into your daily commute to and from work, so take a break from the same old boring radio stations, podcasts and music streaming services and play some trivia already!

Test your knowledge across our 7 trivia categories covering:

* Music
* Literature
* TV & Film
* History & Society
* The World
* Science & Technology
* Sports & Leisure

Each daily episode features three quizzes of 7 questions each - growing in difficulty as you progress. The quizzes are presented by two real-life hosts (and sometimes special guest stars), who will entertain and educate you as you make your way through each show.

Also featuring:

* Daily, weekly, monthly and all-time leaderboards so you can see how you’re doing against others
* Completely hands-free gameplay - 100% safe for drivers
* The ability to play entirely in the background - keep your favorite mapping app in the foreground
* The latest speech recognition technology with near-100% accuracy
* The ability to challenge your real-life friends, family and work colleagues
* Notifications that inform you the moment that the day’s show is available, and other key events
* Persistent tracking of your stats, so you can see how you’re improving over time
* 100% privacy - we don’t ever store anything you say

You’re going to find yourself asking - “where has this been all my life?!”

We’re adding new features regularly to make the gameplay even better, so be sure to make Drivetime the best part of your work day!
